sathkaraya athiwishishtayi | silumina dilshan da silwa - lekam shri lanka pasal krikat sangamaya hathalis ek wasarak akhandawa pasal kridawata mewan thyaga pradanayak sanwidhanaya kirima udesa palamuwenma eksath prawruththi pathra samagamata pasal krikat sangamaya lesa apage kruthagnyathawaya palakala yuthuyi. 1979 wasare arambaana lada mema thyaga pradanaya thulin merata jathika krikat kridawata kridakayan wishala pirisak bihikirime thothanna lesa meya salakiya hakiyi. 2001 wasare sita mama pasal krikat sangamaye pradhana lekamwaraya lesa therim kamituwe samajikayeku lesa katayuthu kara thibenawa.

putha mona waradak kalatada mehema wune â€œmahanuwara gurudeniya maligathanne yasunaga niwasa sankirnaye padinchi thinula dhamsika rathnayaka (16) daruwage hadisi wiyowa sambandhayen ohuge mama wana mangala abesinha mahatha apa ha pawasuwe kandulu piri denethin ema siddhiya sihipath karamini.mahanuwara dharmaraja widyalaye 10 wana wasare igenuma labu thinula dhamsika rathnayaka padinchiwa sitiye gurudeniya maligathanne grin heritej niwasa sankirnayeya.ohuge piya hitapu hamuda mejarwarayaku wu mahinda rathnayaka mahathaya.

mahawanshayata anuwa anuradhapura rajadhaniye dagab wala akunu sarayen aarakshawa salasima pinisa chuda manikya sawi kirima kerini.ruwanwali saye aarakshawa pinisa palaweni sanghathissa raju (kri.wa 243-247) wajra chumhata nam upakaranayak sawi kala bawa maha wanshayehi sadahan weyi.wajra chumbama yannehi theruma akunu chumbakaya yannaya.nathahoth akunu aakarshanaya karana upakaranaya yannaya.in pasu kri.wa. 437-455 samayehi raja kala dhathusena rajathuma nawathath wajra chumbama upakaranayak ruwanwali sayata sawi kala bawa sadahanya.esema jethawanaramaya ha abhayagiriyatath ,dhathusena rajathuma wisin wajra chumbata sawikarana ladi.in pasu kri.wa. 561-564 di raja pamini mahanaga rajathumada pradhana sthupa thunatama wajra chumbata upakarana sawi kaleya.

prushtawanshin - wikipidiya (kodeta wethin yali-yomu karana ladi) prushtawanshin yanu asthi sakillak sahitha sathwa wisheshayanya.gele sita waligaya dakwa dikwu koduata pelak mowunta pihitayi.prushdawanshinge molaya ghana hiskabalakin aawaranayawi atha.mowunge asthi sakilla katirejayangen nirmanayawana athara pasuwa kalsiyam ekwi shakthimathwe.mema asthi thula rudhiraya nipadawana ata midulu pihita atha.mowunge madhyama snau paddhathiya konduata pela thula pihita atha.mema wanshayata ayath sathun lesa maluwan ubhayajiwin sarpayin kurullan ha kshirapayin dakwiya haka.lowa pura prushtawanshin wishesha 65,000 pamana wasaya karathi.mema wanshayata ayath wishalama sathwaya nil thalmasaya.minisa ayath wanneda mema sathwa kandayatayi.
ee bawa samajayata thawaduratath pasak wuye chandayen pasu janapathi lesa path wuye sirisena mahatha da nathinam wena ayekuda yanna sitha gatha nohaki lesa " janadhipathiwaru pataw gasima" nisaya.
age jiwithaya awasana wiya yuththe me sundara rate oba hamogema aadaraya ekka kiyala aa hithaganna athi.
